login_css.body::after: background: url(./img/logob.png); background-size: auto 100%; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat; opacity: 0.05;
login_css..lgbox: top: max(80px, calc(50% - 20%)); left: max(400px, calc(70% - 160px)); width: 320px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: -2px 6px 53px -23px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); padding: 10px 40px 10px 20px; font-size: smaller;
login_css..langbox: top: max(560px, calc(100vh - 40px)); right: 40px; color: white;
login_css..advtextbox > p: font-weight: 400; font-family: 'Raleway'; font-size: smaller; background-color: #ffffff; color: black; border-radius: 10px; padding: 10px 5px 10px 5px; width: 120px; left: calc(50% - 60px); margin-top: 30px;
login_css.span#signin: top: 40px; right: 100px; position: absolute; font-size: 0.8em; font-weight: 500; color: #0c0d0e;

en.title: Monkvision Dashboards
en.loginsubtag: World's only enterprise-wide AI based active monitorting solution.

register_css.body::after: background: url(./img/logob.png); background-size: auto 100%; width: 100%; height: 100%; background-repeat: no-repeat; opacity: 0.05;
register_css..lgbox: top: max(80px, 25%); left: max(400px, calc(70% - 160px)); width: 320px; background-color: #ffffff; border-radius: 20px; box-shadow: -2px 6px 53px -23px rgba(0,0,0,0.75); padding: 10px 20px 10px 20px; font-size: smaller; padding-right: 40px;
register_css..langbox: top: max(560px, calc(100vh - 40px)); right: 40px; color: white;
register_css..advtextbox > p: font-weight: 400; font-family: 'Raleway'; font-size: smaller; background-color: #ffffff; color: black; border-radius: 10px; padding: 10px 5px 10px 5px; width: 120px; left: calc(50% - 60px); margin-top: 30px;
register_css.span#signin: top: 40px; right: 100px; position: absolute; font-size: 0.8em; font-weight: 500; color: #0c0d0e;

en.title: Monkvision Dashboards
en.loginsubtag: World's only enterprise-wide AI based active monitorting solution.

main_css.div#container: background-color: rgb(215, 215, 215); border-top-left-radius: 20px; left: 64px; width: calc(100% - 64px);
main_css.div#maincontent: top: 65px; width: calc(95vw - 60px); height: calc(100vh - 65px); left: 30px;
main_css.div#leftheader > img.dashicon: border: 0.5px solid #45d19e0d; height: 40px; width: 40px; left: 0px; padding: 5px;margin-bottom: 2px;
main_css.div#leftheader > img.dashicon:hover: left: 0px; padding: 5px;margin-bottom: 2px; border-radius: 5px; border-width: 0.7px; border-style: solid; border-color: white;
main_css.div#leftheader > img.dashicon.selected: left: 0px; padding: 5px; margin-bottom: 5px; border-style: solid; border-radius: 5px; border-width: 0.7px; border-color: white;
main_css.div#leftheader > span: color: white; padding-bottom: 30px; width: 70px; left: 0px; font-size: smaller; font-weight: 500;
main_css.span#header: top: 15px; left: 30px; color: #41cf70; width: calc(100% - 30px); font-family: 'Raleway';
main_css.span#header > span#showtimer: font-weight: bold; background-color: gray; box-shadow: 0 0 1px #50505045; border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; color: rgba(250,250,250,0.95);
main_css.span#header > span#title: width: 300px; font-size: 0.85em; font-weight: bold; background-color: rgba(190,190,190,0.95); box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(34, 25, 25, 0.4); border-radius: 5px; padding: 5px; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.75);
main_css.input#datetimepickerfrom, input#datetime: font-size: 0.8em; font-family: sans-serif; color: rgba(0,0,0,0.75);border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: 0 0 1px rgba(34, 25, 25, 0.4); padding: 2px; border-style: none;

en.title: Monkvision Dashboards
en.clusterAvailSpaceSQL: AVAILABLE DISK SPACE (for DBs, in GB)
en.network_max_trend_tx: NETWORK USAGE FOR INBOUND CONNECTIONS, in Kb/s
en.network_max_trend_rx: NETWORK USAGE FOR OUTBOUND CONNECTIONS, in Kb/s
en.uat_portal_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - UAT PORTAL
en.uat_portal_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - UAT PORTAL
en.uat_mirror_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - UAT MIRROR
en.uat_mirror_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - UAT MIRROR
en.uat_reflect_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - UAT REFLECTOR
en.uat_reflect_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - UAT REFLECTOR
en.prod_portal_01_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - PROD PORTAL-01
en.prod_portal_01_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - PROD PORTAL-01
en.prod_portal_02_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - PROD PORTAL-02
en.prod_portal_02_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - PROD PORTAL-02
en.prod_mirror_01_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - PROD MIRROR-01
en.prod_mirror_01_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - PROD MIRROR-01
en.prod_mirror_02_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - PROD MIRROR-02
en.prod_mirror_02_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - PROD MIRROR-02
en.prod_reflect_01_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - PROD REFLECTOR - 01
en.prod_reflect_01_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - PROD REFLECTOR - 01
en.prod_reflect_02_net_rx: CURRENT TOTAL NET INBOUND(rx rate) - PROD REFLECTOR - 02
en.prod_reflect_02_net_tx: CURRENT TOTAL NET OUTBOUND(tx rate) - PROD REFLECTOR - 02

main_html_data.span-with-menu#gear: styleBody='div.menuitem:hover{background: #45d19e !important; color: white !important;} span#content > img:hover{filter: brightness(70%);transition: all 1s ease;} div#menu{margin-left: -120px;}'
